unnormalised: Hey there, eco-warriors! Ever feel like your garbage bin is overflowing faster than a bucket in Mumbai during monsoon season? Well, you're not alone! Waste management is a HUGE topic right now.

unnormalised: Turns out, cities like Bengaluru are struggling to keep up with the sheer volume of trash we're generating daily. The BBMP (Bruhat Bengaluru Mahanagara Palike) is trying hard, but experts say we need a complete overhaul of our current systems.
